segments.text: Ugh, that sink is a total disaster, water just pouring out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, unaware, her dress might get soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading everywhere, what a sloppy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's fiddling with that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing for cookies, adding to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbling, and he's got his grubby hands in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies will be all over if he drops them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's begging for one, probably going to make crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden looks clean, but inside it's filthy with neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a unclean scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked, towel bunched, everything's a wreck.
segments.speaker: PAR
